Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I was thinking, there are lots of sound mods out there, but there aren't any for the tire squealing sound, like the one in real life. This would be awesome, and almost just as awesome would be to have the tire smoke as well, as you don't really know when you've touched down, of course, with both of these, that problem is eliminated. Anyway, I just really want both of these things in the game, I don't really care if they are in the vanilla game or a mod, of course a mod would probably be better, because then the people complaining about performance issues would annoy the devs into making it an option. I think these would be valuable to the game, and if anyone wants to make a mod for it, then please post a link here.

Thank You in Advance.

-Espresso
